Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2009 10:17PM rosegomes wrote: hi i just joined today had triple negative bc finished chemo radiation after mastectomy on march of this year my hair started falling after about 20 days my husband shaved my head too much hair on the floor, pillows etc so i decided to shave it.  good luck and all the best
